channel.title: A game I made(UPDATE! AUG25 12:11PM!NEW RIDDLES!)(May I remind y'all to post?)
channel.description:
A very simple riddle game I made. Here is the legibility of it: NO VIRUSES!
[img]http://img208.imageshack.us/img208/1383/legibilityho1.png[/img] (yes, It is edited...that's why you see the file name and the status and the bit9 report where th antiviruses are.) When you answr these, you must NOT use "a" e.g: if there is a riddle called "what is big and rubbery and is played ni sports" the answer would be "basketball" not "a basketball" or "the basketball" get it?
UPDATED LINK! NEW RIDDLES!:http://rapidshare.com/files/51225949/Riddlemaster.exe.html
NOTE: I do update this alot, so keep yer eyes peeled! NOTE2:I will give the source to you if you pm me, but that's only a small possibility! You must have a good reason!

(yes, It is edited…that’s why you see the file name and the status and the bit9 report where th antiviruses are.)
When you answr these, you must NOT use “a” e.g:
if there is a riddle called “what is big and rubbery and is played ni sports” the answer would be “basketball” not “a basketball” or “the basketball” get it?
